General.Name: Tsinghuatongfang Co Ltd
General.Description: Tsinghua Tongfang Co., Ltd. engages in digital information, civil nuclear technology, energy conservation and environmental protection, and technology and finance businesses. The company offers computer products, such as PC, commercial products, B2B products, and MECHREVO products, as well as products for educational intelligence; and cloud computing services, such as full stack cloud platform, managed cloud, and localized cloud system and solutions to government and enterprises. It also provides big data and artificial intelligence solutions comprising big data analysis, transportation data analysis center, and SighTa; and operates a Chinese knowledge service portal. In addition, the company offers security and inspection solutions and services in civil aviation, customs, railway, highway, urban railway, logistics, judiciary, big events, and other security areas. Further, it engages in the energy saving and environmental protection business. Tsinghua Tongfang Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Tsinghua Tongfang Hi-tech Plaza, Beijing, China, 100083
